official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to administer a demonstration program for assisting communities and nonprofit organizations in providing emergency food and shelter.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to administer a demonstration program for assisting communities and nonprofit organizations in providing emergency food and shelter. Requires an interim report to Congress within 120 days, and a final report by December 1, 1983. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to administer a demonstration program for assisting communities and nonprofit organizations in providing emergency food and shelter.
